name: The Afterlife (Dragon Lens Studios, Redstonetech125, Mony)
name_original: The Afterlife (Dragon Lens Studios, Redstonetech125, Mony)
description:
After an untimely end, you must make your way through a series of puzzles to escape "the afterlife" and have your own chance at a new beginning. 

Controls:

KEYBOARD:
Move: Arrow Keys/ WASD
Jump: Space

Activate: E

Respawn: R

Pause: Esc/ P

GAMEPAD:
Move: Left Joystick
Jump: Top Button (Y For Xbox/Triangle for Playstation)
Activate: Bottom Button (A For Xbox/ X for Playstation)
Respawn Left Button (X For Xbox/ Square for Playstation)
Pause: Start
